definition: cannot allow (to be present)/cannot admit
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
(negative prefix)/not/no
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: We must emphasize basic management pragmatic, no sophistry is allowed and rash.
sentences.chinese: 抓基础管理一定要强调务实，来不得半点虚假和浮躁。

sentences.english: No dishonesty or conceit whatsoever is permissible in science.
sentences.chinese: 科学来不得半点虚伪和骄傲。

sentences.english: Open-minded is a living concept, and does not allow artificial hypocrisy.
sentences.chinese: 豁达是一种生存观念，来不得半点做作虚伪。

sentences.english: This is a matter of science, which permits no dishonesty.
sentences.chinese: 这是个科学问题，来不得半点虚假。

definition: unable to tolerate/intolerant/unable to bear sth
careless/sloppy/negligent/skimpy
lit. one is one, two is two (idiom)/fig. things are (or ought to be) perfectly clear-cut/unequivocal
pinyin: yi1 shi4 yi1 , er4 shi4 er4

definition: lit. a nail is a nail and a rivet is a rivet (idiom)/fig. meticulous/conscientious/unambiguous
pinyin: ding1 shi4 ding1 , mao3 shi4 mao3

definition: firm/solid/reliable/real/practical
the slightest difference leads to a huge error (idiom)/a miss is as good as a mile
pinyin: cha1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , miu4 yi3 qian1 li3

definition: a tiny lapse can lead to a huge mistake (idiom); a minor discrepancy leading to enormous losses
pinyin: shi1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , miu4 yi3 qian1 li3

definition: to skimp on the job/to work half-heartedly/not to take the job seriously
mistake/slip-up/fault/error (in data transmission)/accident/mishap
to regard sth as a plaything (idiom); to consider unimportant/to view as trifling
child's play/trifling matter
human life is beyond value (idiom)
vitally important/a matter of life and death
unwary/negligent
lit. to arrange a shelf of flowers/superficial display (idiom)
a project of vital and lasting importance
